docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Several months ago in New York City, a young girl died while waiting for the heart and lung transplant that was the only means of extending her life. A few weeks later, a baby boy died before he could be given a new heart.

headline.main: How the Dying Can Save the Living

docs.snippet: LEAD: Several months ago in New York City, a young girl died while waiting for the heart and lung transplant that was the only means of extending her life. A few weeks later, a baby boy died before he could be given a new heart.
